mobile.page.landing.body: Discover how the music you love connects you at Cannes.

mobile.page.search.header: Get started. Search for a song that inspires you.
mobile.page.search.body: We'll match you with people who share your musical taste at the festival.
mobile.page.search.noresults.body: Sorry, we couldn't find that. Search again or try another song.
mobile.page.search.result.topresult.head: Top result
mobile.page.login.body: Let's find your connections. Sign up instantly with Facebook, or use your email to get a sign up link sent to you.
mobile.page.login.disclaimer: We will not store your e-mail or use it for any other purpose.
mobile.page.user.header_tc: By signing in you agree to Spotify's
mobile.page.user.btn_tc: Terms and Conditions of Use and Privacy Policy.
mobile.page.reconnect.body: Already signed up with Facebook? Reconnect to see your Cannes connections. If you signed up with email, please use the link sent to the address you signed up with.
mobile.page.match.connections.speakers.b: Speakers closest to you in Cannes
mobile.page.match.statistics.cannes.head: Cannes sounds like
mobile.page.sharing.copy: Want to see how you’re connected to your friends? Ask them to add a song!
mobile.sharing.twitter.text: How are you connected to the biggest names at #CannesLions? Join the #Spotify music experiment to find out!
mobile.sharing.facebook.title: It all starts with a song.
mobile.sharing.facebook.description: How are you connected to the biggest names at #CannesLions? Join the #Spotify music experiment to find out!
mobile.page.info.body:
Bonjour. Welcome to our social music experiment.

We want to uncover the musical connections between everyone at this year's Cannes Lions. So we're asking a simple question: what song inspires you?

Tell us yours, and we'll show you how the music you love connects you to the people in your industry, and even to speakers like Ne-Yo and Sheryl Sandberg.

Check out your close connections now on this very phone, then see the wider story on desktop and our mammoth real-time projection right on the Palais. We're there every night from 10pm – do join us!
mobile.page.playlist.body2:
We're creating your playlist based on the songs your top connections are listening to. Make sure your Spotify app is not in Offline Mode.

If you don't have the Spotify app, we'll help you download it.
Do you really want to delete your account?
Check your inbox – we've sent you an email with your login link.
mobile.page.alertMessage.upload_image_to: That image is too big. Please choose another one.
mobile.page.alertMessage.device_not_supp: Your device doesn't support this feature.
mobile.page.alertMessage.page_restart.bo: Something's gone wrong. We need to restart the page.
desktop.cannesBefore.landing.mainCopy: We wanted to know the songs that inspire the world’s greatest storytellers. So we asked you. Throughout Cannes Lions we’ll be revealing your shared musical connections, with real time visualisations here and at the Palais.
desktop.cannes.landing.title: It all starts with a song.
desktop.cannes.landing.text:
We want to uncover the musical connections between everyone at this year's Cannes Lions. So we're asking a simple question:
what song inspires you?

Check out your close connections now on your phone
– then see the wider story here on desktop and on our mammoth real-time projection right on the Palais.
desktop.cannes.stats.energy.id_1: Not too pumpin’, not too slumpin’.
desktop.cannes.stats.energy.id_2: There’s a lot of energy in the room.
desktop.cannes.stats.energy.id_3: Wow, these guys are real lively.
desktop.cannes.stats.tempo.id_2: In the summertime, when the tempo is high.
desktop.cannes.stats.mood.id_0: Right now, people feel wound up!
desktop.cannes.stats.mood.id_2: Right now, people feel turnt up!
desktop.cannes.stats.hotness.id_0: These guys have their finger on the pulse. <number> % contributed a popular hit.
desktop.cannes.stats.hotness.id_1: These guys are hip. <number> % contributed an underground track.
desktop.cannes.about.title: About
desktop.cannes.about.content:
Bonjour. Welcome to our social music experiment.

We want to uncover the musical connections between everyone at this year's Cannes Lions. So we're asking a simple question: what song inspires you?

Tell us yours, and we'll show you how the music you love connects you to the people in your industry, and even to speakers like Ne-Yo and Sheryl Sandberg.

Add your song at spotify.com/cannes on your phone, then see the wider story here on desktop and our mammoth real-time projection right on the Palais. We're there every night from 10pm – do join us!
